about.title: About Anmar
about.hero: From Baghdad to Tampere, capturing stories through light and motion.
about.bio: Anmar is a visual artist specializing in photography and videography. Originally from Iraq and now based in Tampere, Finland, his work blends cultural heritage with Nordic minimalism. Each project is an exploration of emotion, narrative, and authentic moments.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.text: I believe every image should tell a story. My process combines technical precision with artistic intuition, creating work that resonates emotionally while maintaining cinematic quality.

contact.title: Let's Create Together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.
